verses.name: Acts 26:16
verses.text: But rise, and stand upon thy feet: for I have appeared unto thee for this purpose, to make thee a minister and a witness both of these things which thou hast seen, and of those things in the which I will appear unto thee;

verses.name: Acts 26:17
verses.text: Delivering thee from the people, and from the Gentiles, unto whom now I send thee,

verses.name: Acts 26:18
verses.text: To open their eyes, and to turn them from darkness to light, and from the power of Satan unto God, that they may receive forgiveness of sins, and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me.
